meanings: a large[great] quantity, enormous volume, a large amount

vlive.korean: [블핑 하우스에서 일어난 의문의 블루베리 대량학살 사건] 무슨 일이야? [Blueberry massacre at BLANKPINK house] What's going on? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BLACKPINK] 바나나..바나나나🎶 비둘기둘하다 블핑이들보는 삶 평생 마이미땅카여도 행복해🖤💖 (BLACKPINK in so high tension)
vlive.english: [Blueberry massacre at BLANKPINK house] What's going on?

vlive.korean: 그리고 저희 거기 다니거든요~ - 나 팩 대량 구매했어. And we go there. - I bought face masks in bulk. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 대기실이에요😘
vlive.english: And we go there. - I bought face masks in bulk.

vlive.korean: [포기하지 않고 재도전] 제가 편의점에서 같은 상품을 4개 정도 대량 구매를 했어요. I bought four of the same items at the convenient store. 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : (여자)아이들 - I-TALK #19 : '한(一)' 첫방 미공개 비하인드
vlive.english: I bought four of the same items at the convenient store.

vlive.korean: 어떻게 카리브해의 작은 섬으로 아프리카계 흑인들이 대량 이주하게 됐을까요? How did so many Africans move to this small island in the Caribbeans? 듣기 View video YOCLUB (요리인류클럽) : [치킨인류] EP3.자메이카 저크 치킨 Chicken Odyssey. Jamican Jerk Chicken
vlive.english: How did so many Africans move to this small island in the Caribbeans?
